import React from "react" class BookingAddServices extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ loading:true } } componentDidMount(props) { this.setState({loading:false}) } render() { //Additional Services let addServices addServices = this.props.services.map(addService => { console.log("AddService", addService.nameService, addService.type) return }); return (

Weitere Dienstleistungen: {this.state.loading ? "" : addServices}

) } } export default BookingAddServices
